info.description:
This is a Cyberpunk RED character sheet for Tableplop. It only encompases the jump start content but should be extendable to include the full ruleset.

Getting started:

  1. Set stat, armor and skill values for your character.
  2. Delete unused skills (optional)
  3. Delete unused weapon attacks from the messages section.
  4. Set your name and icon.

savedMessages.name: dodge
savedMessages.message: Dodge Attack: Attempt to dodge an attack against you (only usable by characters with a Reflexes of 9 or higher for ranged attacks, your reflexes: {Reflexes}). You can't dodge explosions. Hit Difficulty Value: {1d10 + Evasion - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)}

savedMessages.name: heavy-pistol-attack-ranged
savedMessages.message: Heavy Pistol Attack: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[15,20,25,30,30][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: {3d6} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: very-heavy-pistol-attack-ranged
savedMessages.message: Very Heavy Pistol Attack: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[15,20,25,30,30][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: {4d6} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: smg-attack-ranged
savedMessages.message: Submachine Gun Attack: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[15,15,20,25,25,30][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: {2d6} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: assault-rifle-attack-ranged
savedMessages.message: Assault Rifle Attack: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[15,10,10,15,20,25,30][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: {5d6} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: shotgun-attack-ranged
savedMessages.message: Shotgun Attack: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[15,20,25,30,35][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: {5d6} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: rocket-launcher-attack-ranged
savedMessages.message: Rocket Launcher Attack: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[15,15,15,20,20,25,30][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: {7d10} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: assault-rifle-burst-ranged
savedMessages.message: Assault Rifle Three Round Burst: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[12,10,12,18][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: (1) {5d6} (2) {5d6} (3) {5d6} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: smg-burst-ranged
savedMessages.message: Submachine Gun Three Round Burst: Range of {Range = ?:How far is the target:}m. {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs DV{[12,15,22,28][Range < 13 ? 0 : Range < 26 ? 1 : Range < 51 ? 2 : Range < 101 ? 3 : Range < 201 ? 4 : 5]}. Damage: (1) {2d6} (2) {2d6} (3) {2d6} (minus target's armor)

savedMessages.name: cyberarm-melee
savedMessages.message: Cyberarm Attack: {1d10 + Melee-Weapon - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs taget's dodge roll. Damage: {2d6} (minus half of target's armor, rounded up)

savedMessages.name: brawl-melee
savedMessages.message: Brawl: {1d10 + Brawling - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)} to hit vs taget's dodge roll. Damage: {@:[0,0,1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4][Body - 1]:d6} (zero damage against armor)

savedMessages.name: assault-rifle-suppression-ranged
savedMessages.message: Assault Rifle Suppressive Fire: All enemies within 25 feet, who are out of cover and within your line of sight must make a concentration save with a DV of: {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)}. Those who fail the check must on their next turn, use their move action to get into cover, taking the run action if required to reach it.

savedMessages.name: smg-suppression-ranged
savedMessages.message: Submachine Gun Suppressive Fire: All enemies within 25 feet, who are out of cover and within your line of sight must make a concentration save with a DV of: {1d10 + Marksmanship - (Wounded ? 3 : 0)}. Those who fail the check must on their next turn, use their move action to get into cover, taking the run action if required to reach it.

savedMessages.name: death-save
savedMessages.message: Death Save: {Death-Save-Outcome = 1d10 < (Body - Death-Save-Penalty) ? "Success" : "Failure. You are dead."}. {Death-Save-Penalty = (Death-Save-Outcome == "Success" ? Death-Save-Penalty + 1 : 0)}

savedMessages.name: stand-up
savedMessages.message: Get Up: Use a Basic Action to stand up from Prone. While Prone you cannot use your Move Action until you use this Action.

savedMessages.name: run
savedMessages.message: Run: Use a Basic Action to take an additional Move Action. If you can’t use a Move Action right now, you can’t use this Action.

savedMessages.name: reset-death-penalty
savedMessages.message: Death Penalty reset to {Death-Save-Penalty = 0}.

savedMessages.name: banhammer-attack-net
savedMessages.message: Banhammer: {1d10 + Interface + 2} to hit, {2d6} damage + {1d6} extra to hellhounds. Can only target programs.

savedMessages.name: scanner-meat
savedMessages.message: Scanner: Uses a normal meatspace action to search for nearby net access points.

savedMessages.name: backdoor-net
savedMessages.message: Backdoor: Use a net action to attempt to break through passwords in the net, not required if you know the password. Roll: {1d10 + Interface}

savedMessages.name: pathfinder-net
savedMessages.message: Pathfinder: Use a net action to partially reveal a map of the net, the higher the check the more you learn. Roll: {1d10 + Interface}

savedMessages.name: slide-net
savedMessages.message: Slide: Use a net action to attempt to flee combat with a Black ICE program. If you succeed you can move to adjacent floor but not past a password or other obstruction. You can only attempt to slide once per turn. Roll: {1d10 + Interface}

savedMessages.name: zap-net-attack
savedMessages.message: Zap: Use a net action to make an attack against a program or enemy netrunner. Roll: {1d10 + Interface} to hit, {1d6} damage.

savedMessages.name: eye dee-net
savedMessages.message: Eye-Dee: Use a net action to attempt to identify a piece of data you have obtained (e.g. a file). Roll: {1d10 + Interface}

savedMessages.name: control-net
savedMessages.message: Control: Use a net action to attempt to take control of systems, or to operate systems you have taken control of (e.g. camera, robot, alarm). Roll: {1d10 + Interface}

savedMessages.name: virus-net
savedMessages.message: Virus: Once you have reached the final level you can leave a virus of your design in the system. The more advanced/complex the virus is, the more net actions and higher DV will be required to create it successfully. {1d10 + Interface}

savedMessages.name: cloak-net
savedMessages.message: Cloak: Use a net action to hide your presence and any viruses you have left behind in the system. {1d10 + Interface}

savedMessages.name: speed-gonzalvez-net
savedMessages.message: Speedy Gonzalvez: Use a net action to increase your speed by +4 while this program is rezzed.
